an1.248-257:1.1: “The foremost of my laymen in first going for refuge are the merchants Tapussa and Bhallika.
an1.248-257:2.1: … as a donor is the householder Sudatta Anāthapiṇḍika.
an1.248-257:3.1: … who speak on the teaching is the householder Citta Macchikāsaṇḍika.
an1.248-257:4.1: … who attract a congregation by the four ways of being inclusive is Hatthaka Āḷavaka.
an1.248-257:5.1: … who donate fine things is Mahānāma Sakka.
an1.248-257:6.1: … who donate nice things is the householder Ugga of Vesālī.
an1.248-257:7.1: … who attend on the Saṅgha is the householder Uggata of Hatthi Village.
an1.248-257:8.1: … who have experiential confidence is Sūrambaṭṭha.
an1.248-257:9.1: … who have confidence in a person is Jīvaka Komārabhacca.
an1.248-257:10.1: … who are intimate is the householder Nakula’s father.”
